item.description: To add JSON schema validation to e.g. Cargo.toml files in VSCode using tamasfe.even-better-toml, you can add a special comment: #:schema https://json.schemastore.org/cargo.json # see https://taplo.tamasfe.dev/configuration/directives.html#the-schema-directive
